channel.title: phil1988/freedi
channel.description: An open OS + display firmware for QIDI 3D printers

item.title: FreeDi v1.40 released - Update instructions
item.description:
### v1.40 has just been released!
This update includes several "under the hood" changes that can't be updated through Moonraker Update Manager. I'm really sorry about this - unfortunately, there‚Äôs no other way, and I hope you understand. This update changes many things that you will not even notice, but it was needed to enable the desired features.
To take advantage of these, you can either flash the images from the release section or manually add the new features.
This is a How-To for all of you curr...

item.title: [Announcement] Temporary reduced availability
item.description:
To all the **FreeDi**ans! Over the next six weeks, I will be focusing intensively on personal matters.
I kindly ask for your understanding if I'm not as available as usual during this time. I'm confident that with the Wiki üìë , the video guide üìπ , and the amazing people ‚ù§ in this community, most questions can be answered and issues resolved. A huge thank you to everyone who contributes to this project and helps others along the way - it truly makes a difference! I'm already looking forward to ...
